overview: Juan (Armendariz) lives in a trash depository in Mexico City. He knows Lila (Pereyra), a drug addict rich girl who reminds him of his long lost daughter. Lila is kidnapped by drug dealers and Juan feels responsible for her. He takes the long way to Tijuana to rescue Lila.  (Written by Maximiliano Maza mmaza@campus.mty.itesm.mx)
title: Camino largo a Tijuana
